title: Ticket #3865: Update GSI_DAEMON_NAME in configuration section
description:
GSI_DAEMON_NAME has been "retired" (whatever that implies!), but it is discussed at length in section 3.6 as if it is the preferred mechanism.

We should probably remove these references and replace them with GSI_SKIP_HOST_CHECK_CERT_REGEX.

Dan Bradley included a good description of these variables in 3.3; he or ZKM are probably the best UW-local resource to help update the security section.
